thread.title: BRIEF-Helix $125 mln offering priced at 4.125 % convertible senior notes due 2023

title: BRIEF-Helix $125 mln offering priced at 4.125 % convertible senior notes due 2023

organizations.name: reuters) - helix energy solutions group inc

text: March 14, 2018 / 3:33 AM / Updated an hour ago BRIEF-Helix $125 mln offering priced at 4.125 % convertible senior notes due 2023 Reuters Staff March 13 (Reuters) - Helix Energy Solutions Group Inc : * HELIX ANNOUNCES PRICING OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES OFFERING * HELIX ENERGY SOLUTIONS GROUP INC SAYS ‍ PRICED AN OFFERING OF $125 MILLION PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF 4.125% CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
